experiments.name: stationary_linear
experiments.description: Sinusoidal time series, imagined to arise from a linear system, with observation noise.

experiments.name: nonstationary_trend_linear
experiments.description: Sinusoidal time series, imagined to arise from a linear system, with observation noise and a nonstationary trend in the mean.

experiments.name: nonstationary_variance_increase_linear
experiments.description: Sinusoidal time series, imagined to arise from a linear system, with observation noise and a nonstationary seasonal component.

experiments.name: nonstationary_oscillation_speed_linear
experiments.description: Sinusoidal time series, imagined to arise from a linear system, with observation noise and a nonstationary trend and seasonal component.

experiments.name: stationary_equilibrium
experiments.description: Ricker system at equilibrium with process noise and fixed mean.

experiments.name: nonstationary_equilibrium_trend
experiments.description: Ricker system at equilibrium with process noise and time dependent mean.
